title: The Ring of Five
author: Eoin McNamee
genre: Fiction, Middle-Grade / Young Adult, Fantasy / Adventure
description: The first book in the Ring of Five trilogy. Danny Caulfield is sent to a mysterious academy for spies called Wilsons, where he discovers hidden talents and makes unusual friends while training for his destiny in a world of espionage, intrigue, and betrayal. Full of adventure and fantasy elements. 352 pages. Published by Random House Children’s Books. :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}
publisher: Wendy Lamb Books / Random House Children’s Books
